short_description: Our customers operate across many sectors, including but not limited to: manufacturing, utilities, nuclear, energy, IT, finance, shipping, supply chain, healthcare and education.
long_description: Our customers operate across many sectors, including but not limited to: manufacturing, utilities, nuclear, energy, IT, finance, shipping, supply chain, healthcare and education. We are ISO 27001 certified and meet the GDPR requirements. Further more, for customers who want to store their data locally, we offer an On-Premise solution.
